## Content

The PAB lab management pages include information about the people that make up the branch and resources related to day-to-day processes of the NEFSC, including onboarding, how information is stored and shared on the server, and links to examples of media engagement. 

For any information that needs to be updated/removed, please submit an issue by clicking ‘Report an issue’ on the top right corner of this page.

## Relevant links


[NEFCS HomePort](https://sites.google.com/noaa.gov/nefscportal/home?authuser=0): The intranet site for all guidance, training, and helpful information about the NEFSC.

* [FY25 updates](https://sites.google.com/noaa.gov/nefscportal/fy2025-updates?authuser=0): Landing page that details all recent and ongoing FY25 changes

* [NEFSC Guidance](https://sites.google.com/noaa.gov/nefscportal/nefsc-guidelines?authuser=0): Provides links to all relevant NEFSC administrative guidance including no-cost travel and timekeeping
